target.name: help
target.echo: Phing Launcher: - phing-launcher.self-update : self update the Phing Launcher script.

Composer: - composer.install : installs the project dependencies with Composer. [composer.parameters] : add some parameters to the command (default: "") [composer.directory] : run the command in a specific directory (default: .) example : ./phing.sh composer.install -Dcomposer.parameters="--no-dev --no-scripts" - composer.update : updates the project dependencies with Composer. + see the composer.install description.
PHPUnit: - phpunit.run : run the PHPUnit tests (for Continuous Itegration). - phpunit.run.no-dependency : run the PHPUnit tests without installing all the dependencies.
